price: “Mu by’ukuri wowe nta bubasha uzagira ku bagaragu banjye, uretse abayobye bazagukurikira.”
arabic: إِنَّ عِبَادِي لَيۡسَ لَكَ عَلَيۡهِمۡ سُلۡطَٰنٌ إِلَّا مَنِ ٱتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ ٱلۡغَاوِينَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: inna ʿibādī laysa laka ʿalayhim sul'ṭānun illā mani ittabaʿaka mina al-ghāwīna
